content: PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Would you recommend to delay HDB loan payback (30 yrs vs. 20 yrs), so that the money in CPF OA can have a longer time to compound?1 answerAnswerBump3
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jim Tay, Director at Jimtay.comLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 05 Mar 2019If you are using CPF to pay off your loan, then it's a big NO!Because you are also compounding the amount of CPF you need to return to your account when you sell your flat in future.0 comments0
